tables.name: forecast_table
tables.alias: SELECT sku_id, channel_id, date, forecast_units, forecast_revenue, total_adjustment, 1 as dummy_col_1 FROM forecast_daily  WHERE strategy_id = $strategyId AND is_latest_computation='true' order by date

tables.name: past_future_events
tables.alias: select * from (select id, channel_id, start_date, end_date, distribution, CAST(null AS BOOLEAN) as is_enabled, name, type, percentage from fact_advertising) as aa union all (select id, channel_id, start_date, end_date, distribution, is_enabled, name, type, percentage from fact_proposed_advertising where strategy_id = $strategyId )

tables.name: product_variations
tables.alias: select aa.product_id, bb.upc, aa.sku_per_model_list from (select product_id,  json_object_agg(id, json_build_object( 'Color', to_json(attributes->'Color'), 'Scent', to_json(attributes->'Scent'))) as sku_per_model_list  from dim_sku group by product_id) as aa full join (select product_id, upc from dim_sku) as bb on (aa.product_id = bb.product_id)

tables.name: sell_through_table
tables.alias: select channel_id, sku_id, date, sum(units) as ordered_qty, 1 as dummy_col_sell_thru from fact_daily_sales where is_sell_through is True group by channel_id, sku_id,date

tables.name: sell_in_table
tables.alias: select channel_id, sku_id, date, sum(units) as ordered_qty, sum(average_price) as total_price, ROUND(sum(units) * avg(average_price)) AS sales_revenue, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CAST(date::date AS DATE)) as month, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CAST(date::date AS DATE)) as year, 1 as dummy_col_sell_in from fact_daily_sales where is_sell_through is False group by channel_id, sku_id,date

tables.name: m_sku_channel_merged
tables.alias: select 1 as dummy_col, aa.sku_id, aa.channel_id, forecast_error_last_month, forecast_error_2nd_last_month, forecast_error_3rd_last_month, forecast_error_last_month_underperform, forecast_error_last_month_overperform, forecast_last_month_units, forecast_current_month_units, forecast_next_month_units, forecast_next_2nd_month_units, forecast_sell_in_velocity_current_month, forecast_sell_in_velocity_next_month, forecast_sell_in_velocity_next_2nd_month, sales_velocity_last_month, sales_velocity_2nd_last_month, sales_velocity_3rd_last_month, sales_velocity_last_month_dollars, sales_velocity_2nd_last_month_dollars, sales_velocity_3rd_last_month_dollars, sales_current_month, revenue_current_month, sales_last_month, sales_2nd_last_month, sales_3rd_last_month, revenue_last_month, revenue_2nd_last_month, revenue_3rd_last_month from (select * from m_sku_channel) as aa full join (select * from m_sku_channel_strategy where strategy_id = $strategyId) as bb on (aa.sku_id = bb.sku_id and aa.channel_id = bb.channel_id)

tables.name: fact_past_and_future_sales_orders
tables.alias: SELECT * FROM (SELECT past.sku_id, past.channel_id, past.date, past.units AS actual_units, past.units * past.average_price AS actual_revenue, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CAST(past.date::date AS DATE)) as month, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CAST(past.date::date AS DATE)) as year, 0 AS forecast_units, 0 AS forecast_revenue, 0 AS total_adjustment, 1 as dummy_col_1 FROM fact_daily_sales past WHERE past.date < CURRENT_DATE AND past.is_sell_through = false) AS past_long union all (SELECT future.sku_id, future.channel_id, future.date, 0 AS actual_units, 0 AS actual_revenue, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CAST(future.date::date AS DATE)) as month, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CAST(future.date::date AS DATE)) as year,future.forecast_units as forecast_units, future.forecast_revenue as forecast_revenue, total_adjustment, 1 as dummy_col_1 FROM forecast_daily as future WHERE future.date >= CURRENT_DATE AND future.strategy_id = $strategyId AND future.is_latest_computation='true')
